channel.title: Ev on Betting On Success

item.title: Expected Value
item.description: Expected Value This is another important Definition post where we’ll define a concept that we can then apply to investing. I will even give examples of how Expected Value (EV) can be applied each and every day. So I think we all understand what Value is. We value $, time, family, or if you’re like me in the mornings sleep. Expectation is the act of looking toward the future and planning on something happening.
